Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.2 Sahetukaduka » 1.2.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 1.2.5.1 Paccayānuloma » 1.2.5.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Hetugocchaka
Sahetukaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
91.
246Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte cha, aññamaññe cha, nissaye cha, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha…pe…  vipāke dve, āhāre cha, indriye cha, jhāne cha, magge pañca…pe…  avigate cha. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
247Anulomaṃ.
